name: brandrevitalize
overview: BrandRevitalize was created in 2005 for the sole purpose of protecting, repairing and reinforcing your name on the Internet. Since 2005, we have grown to be one of the worldâ€™s first comprehensive Online Reputation Management (ORM) firm with clients in over 40 countries and with offices in four major cities worldwide. Our team is composed of professionals specializing in communication technology. Each member of our team draws his or her expertise and market knowledge in providing your company a distinct and significant perspective so your message can be heard. Our image advocates teams are composed of senior level Search Engine Optimization (SEO) experts providing you nothing but the best in SEO strategies and public relations initiatives. Our account managers make it mandatory to be involved with each aspect of your program and will be working closely with you to fully comprehend your business needs thus becoming an extension of your marketing team.
